org.apache.flink.runtime.akka

类 AkkaJobManagerGateway

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.akka.AkkaJobManagerGateway
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    JobManagerGateway, RpcGateway, RestfulGateway

    public class AkkaJobManagerGateway
extends java.lang.Object
implements JobManagerGateway
    Implementation of the JobManagerGateway for old JobManager code based on Akka actors and the ActorGateway.

    • 字段概要

      • cancelJobWithSavepoint

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.String> cancelJobWithSavepoint(JobID jobId,
                                                                                       java.lang.String savepointPath,
                                                                                       Time timeout)
        从接口复制的说明: JobManagerGateway
        Cancels the given job after taking a savepoint and returning its path. If the savepointPath is null, then the JobManager will use the default savepoint directory to store the savepoint in. After the savepoint has been taken and the job has been canceled successfully, the path of the savepoint is returned.
        指定者:
        cancelJobWithSavepoint 在接口中 JobManagerGateway
        参数:
        jobId - identifying the job to cancel
        savepointPath - Optional path for the savepoint to be stored under; if null, then the default path is taken
        timeout - for the asynchronous operation
        返回:
        Future containing the savepoint path of the taken savepoint or an Exception if the operation failed

      • requestTaskManagerInstance

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.Optional<Instance>> requestTaskManagerInstance(ResourceID resourceId,
                                                                                                       Time timeout)
        从接口复制的说明: JobManagerGateway
        Requests the TaskManager instance registered under the given instanceId from the JobManager. If there is no Instance registered, then Optional.empty() is returned.
        指定者:
        requestTaskManagerInstance 在接口中 JobManagerGateway
        参数:
        resourceId - identifying the TaskManager which shall be retrieved
        timeout - for the asynchronous operation
        返回:
        Future containing the TaskManager instance registered under instanceId, otherwise Optional.empty()

                                                                                     boolean includeFinished,
                                                                                     Time timeout)
        从接口复制的说明: RestfulGateway
        Requests job details currently being executed on the Flink cluster.
        指定者:
        requestJobDetails 在接口中 RestfulGateway
        参数:
        includeRunning - true if running jobs shall be included, otherwise false
        includeFinished - true if finished jobs shall be included, otherwise false
        timeout - for the asynchronous operation
        返回:
        Future containing the job details

      • requestJob

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<AccessExecutionGraph> requestJob(JobID jobId,
                                                                               Time timeout)
        从接口复制的说明: RestfulGateway
        Requests the AccessExecutionGraph for the given jobId. If there is no such graph, then the future is completed with a FlinkJobNotFoundException.
        指定者:
        requestJob 在接口中 RestfulGateway
        参数:
        jobId - identifying the job whose AccessExecutionGraph is requested
        timeout - for the asynchronous operation
        返回:
        Future containing the AccessExecutionGraph for the given jobId, otherwise FlinkJobNotFoundException
